metadata.title: What type of motors can be supported by the solution kit?

sections.content:
Question:
What type of motors can be supported by the solution kit?
Answer:
The evaluation kit supports 3-phase Permanent Magnet Synchronous (PMSM, PMAC, BLAC) and 3-phase Brushless DC (BLDC) motors. It was tested with motor types NANOTEC DB42S03 or DB42M03, 24VDC, 4000 RPM or type MB57GA240.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
